feed.title: NetBird Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 3d2a2377 Don't return errors on disallowed routes (#1792)
  • 25f5f265 Timeout rule removing loop and catch IPv6 unsupported error in loop (#1791)
  • bb0d5c5b Linux legacy routing (#1774)
  • 79382951 Feature/exit nodes - Windows and macOS support (#1726)
  • 9af532fe Get scope from endpoint url instead of hardcoding (#1770)
  • 23a14737 Fix grammar in readme (#1778)

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Expect correct conn type by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1801

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.27.0...v0.27.1

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.2
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 3ed2f08f Add latency based routing (#1732)
  • 4c83408f Add log-level to the management's docker service command (#1820)
  • 90bd39c7 Log panics (#1818)
  • dd0cf411 Auto restart Windows agent daemon service (#1819)
  • 22b2caff Remove dns based cloud detection (#1812)
  • c1f66d13 Retry macOS route command (#1817)
  • ac0fe602 Fix routing issues with MacOS (#1815)
  • c2865771 Fix function names in comments (#1816)
  • 1d1d057e Change the dashboard image pull from wiretrustee to netbirdio (#1804)

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow owners that did not create the account to delete it by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1825
  • Rename variable by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1829
  • Don't use the custom dialer as non-root by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1823
  • Routes is a map, employing safe read/writes ops by @hurricanehrndz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1760
  • Use route active store by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1834
  • Use fixed prefs by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1836
  • Allow disabling custom routing by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1840
  • Add sysctl opts to prevent reverse path filtering from dropping fwmark packets by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1839

New Contributors

  • @hurricanehrndz made their first contribution in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1760

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.27.2...v0.27.3

entry.title: New release for NetBird: v0.27.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Pass integrated validator for API by @pappz in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1814
  • Use fixed activity codes by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1846
  • Fix ICE endpoint remote port in status by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1851
  • Migrate serializer:gob fields to serializer:json by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1855
  • Use a better way to insert data in batches by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1874
  • Copy client binary to a directory in path by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1842
  • Update README.md by @braginini in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1821
  • Redeem invite only when incoming user was invited by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1861
  • Add support for GUI app to display error by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1844
  • Fix DNS not found query response by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1877
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.20.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1867
  • Feature/route selection by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1865
  • Add account locks to getAccountWithAuthorizationClaims method by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1847
  • Support exit nodes on iOS by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1878
  • Add retry to IdP cache lookup by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1882
  • Support rosenpass on iOS by @pascal-fischer in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1879
  • Fix incorrect response content-type header by @bcmmbaga in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1887
  • Replace powershell with route command by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1880
  • Add client debug features by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1884
  • Check if channel exist before sending network map by @mlsmaycon in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1894
  • Fix route selection IDs by @lixmal in https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/pull/1890

Full Changelog: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird/compare/v0.27.3...v0.27.4
